comments.comment: Kumara welgama mahatha debidi katha epa. Pohotuwata nogihin inna bawa aththa, prathipaththiyak washayen. Enam ay thaamath Mahindhata aadhare.....??? Drohikam karapu aya samanga aaye mona kathadha. Mahkindha samanga thibena sambandhakam nathara karanna. Srilanka Nidahas Pashayata ekathuwunata passe pohottuwe aya thamage hathurek. Oba hathurek nowunata  , obath samanga danatamath oba gana hathurek wela hamarai Mahindha. Namuth oba kiwwa mama kaatadha chande denne kiyala ahanna epa kiyala, eake theruma oba Pohottuwata chandha dhena bawa podi sakayak athi wenawa. Mahindha obage mithrayek nisa. Oba awanka nam kelinma kiyanna puluwan neadha mama S.L.F.P. yata chandhe denawa kiyala. Mama kiwwa dhe harineadha?
